cases.name: Complete checkout flow
cases.description: User can complete checkout with valid cart
cases.setup: Login as customer, add item to cart
cases.action: Navigate to checkout, fill shipping, submit order
cases.assertion: Order confirmation page displayed with order ID

cases.setup: Login, add item with known price
